## Public Member Functions

### applyFixup() {#a263b9d8d10bb2bbf8c37c7182f6f7f3a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DirectXMCTargetDesc.cpp&#125;::DXILAsmBackend::applyFixup (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp; Target, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; char &gt; Data, uint64&#95;t Value, bool IsResolved, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Apply the <code>Value</code> for given <code>Fixup</code> into the provided data fragment, at the offset specified by the fixup and following the fixup kind as appropriate.

Errors (such as an out of range fixup value) should be reported via <code>Ctx</code>. The <code>STI</code> is present only for fragments of type MCRelaxableFragment and MCDataFragment with hasInstructions() == true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/lib/target/directx/mctargetdesc/directxmctargetdesc-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/lib/target/directx/mctargetdesc/directxmctargetdesc-cpp">DirectXMCTargetDesc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### writeNopData() {#a2f1b3fabd0cb730aaaa288354b6d3adb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DirectXMCTargetDesc.cpp&#125;::DXILAsmBackend::writeNopData (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, uint64&#95;t Count, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Write an (optimal) nop sequence of Count bytes to the given output.

If the target cannot generate such a sequence, it should return an error.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
- True on success.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/lib/target/directx/mctargetdesc/directxmctargetdesc-cpp/#l00092">92</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/lib/target/directx/mctargetdesc/directxmctargetdesc-cpp">DirectXMCTargetDesc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
